name: irishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of being Irish, or qualities that are considered typical of Irish people: He said his Irishness has helped him in his career. A kind of Irishness has been embraced as part of the American culture.
More examplesFewer examplesShe wanted to immerse herself in Irishness, but was disappointed at how few Irish people she met there.I was born in a place where Irishness and Britishness overlapped every day.The novel has become a celebration of Irishness, regarded as the pinnacle of Irish culture.
